reasoning: Cholangiocarcinoma (bile duct cancer) global incidence ~2.5 per 100k from GLOBOCAN estimates. Metastatic disease at diagnosis represents approximately 40-50% of cases. Estimated metastatic incidence at ~1.2 per 100k. Moderate confidence limited by proportion estimation of metastatic disease at diagnosis and geographic variation in presentation.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC) - cholangiocarcinoma data; proportion of metastatic disease at diagnosis estimated from clinical series
